data.message: Sorry if this isn't about the video... But could you please change the time on the posts? I just noticed that when I wrote to a friend to say Happy Birthday, but her birthday isn't until tomorrow. It's only 11.15pm now, and when I wrote the post, it showed 12.31am, when it actually was 11.01pm... I live in Sweden.

replies.message: We appreciate you letting us know about this, Nina. Please help us track this by reporting it through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2aNGORe. Thanks! -Kevin

Hey Nina my friend and I last night was having a few beers.and talking about Facebook and the FABULOUS thing they are doing , then your unbelievable selfishness came up for the whole world to see  wow there's one IN every crowd
And Thank You Facebook for fixing the problem! :-) (y)

Now that's all we really need is for more people to be mean to others from a far as if there's not enough of that going on today, I don't think that's what Facebook really intended but AWESOME JOB TO THE TEAM AND ALL WHO HELPED TO ACHIEVE YOUR SUCCESS AND KEEP EXCEEDING YOUR GOALS AND GOD BLESS YOUR FAMILIES AND YOU FOR THE TIME SPENT AWAY TO GIVE TO THE REST OF THE WORLD  !!! MUCH APPRECIATED, PAY IT FORWARD.... :-)

No kidding Trent! Thank you for that bit of kindness. Matt Letterman and Mike Merry could learn a thing or two from you. There was absolutely no call for such blatant and rude behavior. It is an insult to all of us when people act in such a boorish manner and we should all point it out for what it is and not accept it in a civilized society.. Social graces people. Learn what they are.
I'm sorry to hear you live in Sweden.

Wow...Mike...your point is what exactly??...and Matt...you want to bash someone's looks...start with looking in the mirror. While you're at it, pick up a dictionary to spell check your crap shoot comment..."a lot" is two words not one. Get a friggen grip and grow up...the world has enough bullies leave Nina alone.
I'm sorry I just spent the last 30 sec reading these comments and replying ...wow

I just wonder what people feel like when they try to bully other people? Do you have your own problems in the family, perhaps? And Thank You to the others. I, and others, thinks I am cute!! And I love living in Sweden! And in England when I am there, so no one needs to think about that, only your own living situation, okay?!?
